data.name: Trainz 2019 DLC - SSR Fletchers Crawfords GE C44aci Pack
data.detailed_description:
The C44aci is a model of Australian heavy duty diesel electric locomotive designed by UGL Rail and built at the Broadmeadow factory. It is operated by a number of rail freight operators. The design is based on the National Rail NR class but with some modifications and upgraded features. This specific pack includes PHC, FIE, and CEY classes covering each classes liveries with multiple weathering levels.



This locomotive includes:

5 Changeable Weathering Options

An Advanced Custom Cab

Opening & Closing Engine Doors

Opening & Closing Cab Doors

Opening & Closing Windows

Changeable Unit Numbers (for coal trains)

Changeable Marker Light Formations

ILR Holder Toggle On/Off

Number Board Light On/Off

Crew On/Off

Emissive Headlights & Ditch Lights

Hood, Step & Coupler Lights On/Off

Blinds Raised/Lowered

Full PBR Texturing



This Pack Includes:

CRFD C44 PHC001 T1

SSR C44 FIE T1

SSR C44 CEY T1

CRFD C44 PHC002 T1

data.short_description: Drive the Australian C44Aci diesel locomotives, in the Crawfords (PHC class), Fletchers/SSR (FIE class), and Southern Shorthaul Railroad (CEY class) liveries, each with multiple weathering levels and custom features.
data.supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Russian, Czech, Dutch, Polish, Portuguese, Simplified Chinese

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 64bit
  • Processor: Intel i5 3GHz 64Bit Processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GT 430 or better/ AMD ATI 5550 or better
  • Storage: 1200 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Yes

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.12
  • Processor: Intel i5 2Ghz
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon Pro 555 with 1GB VRAM supporting OpenGL 3.3
  • Storage: 1200 MB available space
